title: How to Make a Paper Clock for Teaching Time

steps.headline: Cut out a Paper Circle for the base.
Cut out Paper Hands (arrows for the hands).
Make a hole in the middle of paper circle.
Attach both hands to the butterfly pin.
Decorate it!
steps.description: You don't want your audience of learners to be bored with a plain piece of paper!

steps.headline: Incorporate fun games into the learning process such as who can tell the time first.
Last but not least, have fun!
You can also use a paper plate so you don't have to cut anything it is all ready for you to put the hands on.
